name: Microsoft Windows Hyper-V NT Kernel Integration VSP权限提升漏洞
product: ["Microsoft Windows 10 22H2", "Microsoft Window 11 22H2", "Microsoft Windows Server 2022 23H2", "Microsoft Windows 11 23H2", "Microsoft Windows Server 2025", "Microsoft Windows 11 24h2"]
description: Microsoft Windows Hyper-V是美国微软（Microsoft）公司的一款可提供硬件虚拟化的工具。Microsoft Windows Hyper-V NT Kernel Integration VSP存在权限提升漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞在系统上获取提升的权限。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-21333
patch: Microsoft Windows Hyper-V NT Kernel Integration VSP权限提升漏洞的补丁
